ValidationRule.description: Benefit Option does not match medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NEPs_Complete__c > DATE (2019,01,10), ISPICKVAL(Medical_Option__c,'PBS Medical'), ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved for Non-Medical/Not Offering")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c, "Approved to Self-Retain")|| ISPICKVAL(Initial_Medical_UW_Approval__c,"") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Benefit Option does not match Initial Medical approval. Check to make sure option is correct or see Medical UW Team.
